game.name: LANESPLIT
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 고속도로를 장악하고, 교통을 뚫고 질주하며, 나만의 바이크를 커스터마이징하여 짜릿한 스릴을 경험하세요. 친구들과 함께 달리고, 라이벌과 경쟁하며, 리더보드 정상을 차지할 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Push performance bikes to the absolute limit, and weave through traffic where one wrong move can spell disaster.
